text: Adamy () is a rural locality (an aul) in Krasnogvardeyskoye Rural Settlement of Krasnogvardeysky District, Adygea, Russia. The population was 1340 as of 2018. There are 28 streets. == Geography == The aul is located on the shore of the Krasnodar Reservoir of the Kuban River, near the mouth of the Belaya River. == Ethnicity == The aul is inhabited by Adighes. == References == Category:Rural localities in Krasnogvardeysky District
title: Adamy, Russia
